coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the bottle reads 'Bottled by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Pink Dragon Draft
coreAttributes.description: The recipe for this mysterious liquid and how it has maintained its carbonation for so long are both unknown. Even the dragons for whom this beverage was named after have mostly forgotten. Those who have tasted it have described it as tasting vaguely of prickly pears.

useDescriptions.selfUse: After opening it, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of Pink Dragon Draft [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. The smell of fresh prickly pears punctuated by carbonation rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the tingly liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] much more refreshed.
